advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Send digital greetings from the comfort of your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.  You get instant access to greetings featuring animation, music, and the ability to add your own photos and words.  Any card can be delivered via email or posted to Facebook, and there are no per-card charges – EVER!   We regularly release new cards without requiring an app update, so you’ll always have the cards you need for holidays, for celebrations, and even for the everyday reasons you stay in touch with friends, family and loved ones.  

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 

ABOUT THE APP

The American Greetings ecard app gives you exclusive access to a vast selection of American Greetings’ greetings wherever you are, whatever the moment. Now you can send the best cards in the world straight from your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad.

FEATURING

* High quality, innovative ecards from the American Greetings creative studio
* Add-a-photo ecards: use photos from your iPhone or iPad to create personalized ecards. 
* CreataCard custom builder: choose from different backgrounds, stickers and messages to create and personalize a one-of-a-kind ecard. 


We’re proud to say no other app around comes close to matching our quality, selection or style! Just tap the app to send a holiday smile, a birthday wish or a quick note to say, "I'm thinking of you" to Facebook friends or anyone with an email address! 

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 

TROUBLESHOOTING 

Did you send a card, but it hasn’t arrived yet?  Here are the two things we’d suggest checking:  
• Is the card you sent in “my cards -> outbox” ?
  • If it is, check your internet connection, and try restarting your device.  The card will send once you’re connected. 

• Is the card showing up in “my cards -> sent” ?
  • If so, make sure you’re connected to the internet, check the spelling on the recipient’s email address and, if necessary, ask your recipient to check their “Spam” folder. 
Other issues?  We’re here to help!  Please contact us at iphone-help@americangreetings.com
releaseNotes: Optimized for iOS 7 with additional bug fixes and improvements.
